0.name: Learn JavaScript from Scratch
0.overview: Master JavaScript fundamentals from the beginning with projects
0.long_description: This course starts from the basics and covers all key JavaScript concepts with hands-on projects. Includes ES6 features, DOM manipulation, AJAX, etc.

1.name: Machine Learning with Python
1.overview: Practical ML techniques using Scikit-Learn and TensorFlow with Python
1.long_description: Master machine learning concepts + implementations using Python. Covers regression, classification, neural networks, deep learning and more with real-world examples.

2.name: Advanced React and Redux
2.overview: Master complex React apps and Redux state management
2.long_description: Take your React skills to the next level by learning hooks, context API, React Router, Redux and more with example fullstack apps

3.name: Rust Programming Language
3.overview: Learn Rust from scratch with real-world projects
3.long_description: Master Rust, including ownership, borrowing, lifetimes, traits, testing, and more. Build real-world apps like a weather CLI, a database engine, a web server, and mining tools.

4.name: Linux Device Drivers Development
4.overview: Master writing robust and secure device drivers for Linux kernel
4.long_description: Learn to develop custom Linux kernel modules, drivers, and filesystems. Covers kernel builds, kernel infrastructure, module development, driver development, debugging kernels and modules, and more.

5.name: Advanced Data Structures and Algorithms
5.overview: Master complex data structures and algorithms in Python
5.long_description: Covers advanced Python implementations of trees, heaps, graphs, dynamic programming, backtracking, recursion, bit manipulation, and more with a focus on performance and optimization techniques.

6.name: Go Systems Programming
6.long_description: Covers Go's systems programming capabilities for building highly scalable network servers, microservices, containers, Linux functionality, advanced concurrency patterns, and more.

7.name: Modern C++ Programming Cookbook
7.overview: Practical recipes for mastering modern C++17/20
7.long_description: Learn the latest C++ features like the STL, multithreading, lambdas, and more through 100+ examples. Covers game dev, emulators, computer vision apps, distributed systems, and other complex programs.

8.name: Advanced iOS Development
8.overview: Build real-world iOS apps with Swift and Xcode
8.long_description: Covers building complex iOS apps integrating with APIs, Core Data, animations, maps, camera, notifications and more. Includes building messaging, travel, ecommerce and social apps from scratch.

9.name: Machine Learning with PyTorch
9.overview: Implement ML models and neural networks with PyTorch
9.long_description: Build neural networks, convolutional networks, RNNs and more from scratch. Covers computer vision, NLP models, reinforcement learning, GANs and applying ML to real world scenarios like fraud detection.

10.name: Advanced Database Systems
10.overview: Master complex database systems and modeling
10.long_description: Covers complex relational databases, NoSQL databases, graph databases, horzizontal/vertical scaling, sharding, replication, transactions, ACID compliance and more.

11.name: Advanced Web Development with React
11.overview: Master complex React web apps and integrations
11.long_description: Build large-scale React web apps integrating with REST APIs, Redux, React Router, authentication, GraphQL, unit testing, webpack, server-side rendering and continuous deployment.
